rules.description: Validates property has an upper case alphabet.

options.name: with
options.description: Test property with supplied pattern, valid if the pattern matches the property.

rules.description: Test property with array of 'with' or 'without' patterns.

options.name: pattern
options.description: Default pattern for number /^\d+(,\d{3})(.\d)?$/. If you are not happy with default supply your own pattern.

options.name: message
options.description: Error message to be displayed when validation fails. Common message for all rules.

options.name: messages
options.description: Object holding error message for each rule.
